name: GPT-4o Transcribe Diarize
description: Advanced speech-to-text model with speaker diarization capabilities. Identifies who's speaking when, producing transcripts with precise speaker labels, segment timestamps, and speaker attribution for multi-speaker audio recordings.
notes: Released October 2025. Extends gpt-4o-transcribe with automatic speaker identification and labeling. Produces diarized_json response format with speaker labels and precise segment start/end timestamps. Supports 100+ languages and dialects. Fast transcription: converts 10 minutes of audio in ~15 seconds. File uploads limited to 25MB. Same pricing as gpt-4o-transcribe (~$0.006 per minute). Ideal for meetings, interviews, and multi-speaker conversations.
